instruction: Modify BIOS settings from the OS to disable Secure Boot using mokutil.

result.command: if efibootmgr 2>/dev/null | grep -i 'secure.*boot.*disabled' | wc -l | grep -q '[1-9]' || cat /sys/firmware/efi/efivars/SecureBoot-* 2>/dev/null | hexdump -C | grep -q '00 00 00 00' | wc -l | grep -q '[1-9]' || dmesg | grep -i 'secure.*boot.*disabled' | wc -l | grep -q '[1-9]' || mokutil --sb-state 2>/dev/null | grep -i 'disabled' | wc -l | grep -q '[1-9]'; then echo 'SECURE_BOOT_DISABLED'; fi
